caption.p: Histopathological slides tissues of oedema paws in experimental groups of rats: (a) Saline group; (b) Carr group; (c) Carr + Ml EtOcF group (200 mg BW); (d) Carr + Indo group. Controls (a), rats treated with carrageenan (b), the combination of carrageenan and indomethacin (c), and treated rats with the combination of carrageenan and Ml EtOcF (d). Ep: epidermis; Der: dermis. Oedema ★. Inflammatory cell ↗.
